title: Diabetes: not so sweet!
creator_credit: Gary Cuttris, Geoff Owen-Taylor and Australian Diabetes Foundation
brief_description: A comprehensive look at diabetes. In particular, a look at symptoms, causes, complications, care skills and diet. A number of specialists are interviewed regarding research. Various case studies are also shown.
creator_credit_for_label: Gary Cuttris, Geoff Owen-Taylor and Australian Diabetes Foundation
